thread.title: rmeyer
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by rmeyer

author: rmeyer
title: rmeyer
text: Overall great experience, good price and the items came very quickly, even with international shipping. Emails updating the statues of the fulfillment of my order were also helpful. The items had definitely been jostled a bit in the shipping process. A couple of the mounting screws popped out of the bindings, though they could be easily found in the box. The skis were also packaged with less (no) padding. Though they arrived unharmed it would be nicer to have them more substantially protected for international shipping.
